.travis.yml

language: node_js

  - "0.12"

  - "8"
after_script: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
